import React, { useContext, useState } from "react"; import { StoreContext } from "../../context/StoreContext"; import './PlaceOrder.css' const PlaceOrder = () => { const { getTotalCartAmount, token, food_list, cartItems, url } = useContext(StoreContext); const [data,setData] = useState({ firstName: "", lastName: "", email:"", }) return (

Delivery Information

Cart Total

Subtotal

${getTotalCartAmount()}

Delivery Fee

${getTotalCartAmount()===0?0:2}

Total ${getTotalCartAmount()===0?0:getTotalCartAmount() + 2}
); }; export default PlaceOrder;
